Admins, please put a close on this tread, it is out of date

This mod still works fine under 0.90. This thread isn't yours to close, just because you're developing a competitor.

I have a problem with Deuterium-Tritium Cryostat: both fuels are boiling off even though I have uninterrupted power supply for them. Here is how it looks like:

Description in the VAB says it shouldn't boil off when powered. The power comes from KIWI reactor attached to electrical generator. Am I missing something here?

I use KSP Interstellar maintenance 0.136 release with KSP 0.9.

This mod still works fine under 0.90. This thread isn't yours to close, just because you're developing a competitor.

The presence of this and the other mod sure is confusing to those of us using 1.02 and new to the game. I came in here after reading about KSPI, and thought it was for the version of the game I bought at regular release (1.0). But this doenst work with that, it is old and outdated from that point of view - as in 0.90 is using pre-release models for a lot of things and is a somewhat different game, as well as not being maintained anymore. Basically this is a legacy mod for a legacy program. And unless its being actively developed, the other author may have a point about closing the thread if the mod author is no longer active in this mod, to redirect effort over to the current release and the continuation/expansion of this.

Now, all that being said, It would be nice to have this available and updated into 1.02 as an alternative - the more the merrier is the better attitude. Plus this seems to be less complex and more game-like than the KSPI-E which seems more Sim like. I do prefer the former, and am working my way through the many mods to find what I like best, and prune the bits I dont use, especially in career mode. Which means in the end, it would be nice to continue this thread for the right reasons.

Edited May 31, 2015 by Murdabenne
